00039 #include <iostream>

00041 #include <QDateTime>
00042 #include <QScriptEngine>

00053 ScriptEditorDialog::ScriptEditorDialog(  QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > listTPhotonMapFactory, QVector< RandomDeviateFactory* > listRandomDeviateFactory, QWidget* parent )
00054 :QDialog( parent ),
00055  m_currentScritFileName( "" ),
00056  m_fileModel( 0 ),
00057  m_interpreter( 0 )
00058 {
00059         setupUi( this );
00060         setWindowFlags( windowFlags() | Qt::WindowMinMaxButtonsHint );
00061 
00062         QSize windowSize = size();
00063         QList<int> sizes;
00064     sizes<<windowSize.height() * 0.8 <<windowSize.height() * 0.2;
00065     dialogVSplitter->setSizes ( sizes );
00066 
00067         QStringList fileNamesFilter;
00068         fileNamesFilter<<"*.tnhs";
00069 
00070         m_fileModel = new FilesModel;
00071         m_fileModel->setRootPath( "" );
00072         m_fileModel->setNameFilters( fileNamesFilter );
00073     fileTree->setModel( m_fileModel );
00074 
00075 
00076         //Init QtScript environment
00077         m_interpreter = new QScriptEngine;
00078 
00079         QScriptValue tonatiuh = m_interpreter->newQObject( parent );
00080         m_interpreter->globalObject().setProperty( "tonatiuh", tonatiuh );
00081 
00082         QObject* rayTracer = new ScriptRayTracer( listTPhotonMapFactory, listRandomDeviateFactory );
00083         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = m_interpreter->newQObject( rayTracer );
00084         m_interpreter->globalObject().setProperty( "rayTracer", rayTracerValue );
00085 
00086          connect( fileTree, SIGNAL( doubleClicked( const QModelIndex& ) ), this, SLOT( OpenScriptFile( const QModelIndex& ) ) );
00087          connect( codeEditorWidget, SIGNAL( FileOpened( QString ) ), this, SLOT( SetCurrentFile( QString ) ) );
00088          connect( codeEditorWidget, SIGNAL( FileSaved( QString ) ), this, SLOT( SetCurrentFile( QString ) ) );
00089          connect( codeEditorWidget, SIGNAL( RunScript( ) ), this, SLOT( RunScript() ) );
00090          connect( runButton, SIGNAL( clicked( bool ) ), this, SLOT( RunScript() ) );
00091          connect( closeButton, SIGNAL( clicked( bool ) ), this, SLOT( Close( bool ) ) );
00092 
00093 
00094 
00095 }

00100 ScriptEditorDialog::~ScriptEditorDialog()
00101 {
00102         delete m_fileModel;
00103         delete m_interpreter;
00104 }

00109 void ScriptEditorDialog::closeEvent( QCloseEvent* event )
00110 {
00111     if ( codeEditorWidget->OkToContinue() )     event->accept();
00112     else event->ignore();
00113 }
00114 
00121 void ScriptEditorDialog::Close( bool /* checked */  )
00122 {
00123    close();
00124 }

00132 void ScriptEditorDialog::OpenScriptFile( const QModelIndex& index )
00133 {
00134         QString fileName = m_fileModel->data( index, QFileSystemModel::FilePathRole ).toString();
00135         QFileInfo fileInfo( fileName );
00136         if( !fileInfo.isDir() )
00137         {
00138                 codeEditorWidget->OpenScriptFile( fileName );
00139         }
00140 
00141 }
00142 
00146 void  ScriptEditorDialog::RunScript()
00147 {
00148 
00149     QDateTime start=QDateTime::currentDateTime();
00150         QString logmessage = QString( "[%1]\t Start running script\n.").arg( start.toString() );
00151         WriteMessage( logmessage );
00152 
00153         int initialized = tonatiuh_script::init( m_interpreter );
00154         if( !initialized )
00155         {
00156                 QString logmessage = QString( "[%1]\t Script Execution Error\n.").arg( QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString() );
00157                 WriteMessage( logmessage );
00158                 std::cerr<<logmessage.toStdString()<<std::endl;
00159 
00160                 return;
00161         }
00162         QScriptValue rayTracerValue = m_interpreter->globalObject().property("rayTracer");
00163         ScriptRayTracer* rayTracer = ( ScriptRayTracer* ) rayTracerValue.toQObject();
00164         QFileInfo currentFile( m_currentScritFileName );
00165         rayTracer->SetDir( currentFile.absoluteDir().absolutePath()  );
00166 
00167         QTextDocument* document = codeEditorWidget->Document();
00168 
00169         QString program = document->toPlainText();
00170 
00171         QScriptSyntaxCheckResult checkResult = m_interpreter->checkSyntax( program );
00172         if( checkResult.state() != QScriptSyntaxCheckResult::Valid )
00173         {
00174                 QString logmessage = QString( "[%1]\t Script Execution Error.\n"
00175                                 "\t Line: %2. %3\n" ).arg( QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString(), QString::number( checkResult.errorLineNumber() ), checkResult.errorMessage () );
00176                 WriteMessage( logmessage );
00177                 std::cerr<<logmessage.toStdString()<<std::endl;
00178 
00179                 return;
00180         }
00181 
00182         QScriptValue result = m_interpreter->evaluate(document->toPlainText());
00183         if( result.isError () )
00184         {
00185                 QString logmessage = QString( "[%1]\t Script Execution Error. %2\n" ).arg( QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString(), result.toString() );
00186                 WriteMessage( logmessage );
00187                 std::cerr<<logmessage.toStdString()<<std::endl;
00188         }
00189         else
00190         {
00191                 /*
00192                  *Display a dialog
00193                  *
00194                 QString st;
00195                 QString area( QString("The valid sun area is %2" ).arg(st.setNum(rayTracer->GetArea())));
00196                 QString drawRays( QString("Number of rays traced per interaction: %1").arg(st.setNum(int(rayTracer->GetNumrays()))));
00197                 QString logmessage = QString( "[%1]\t The script execution is successfully finished in %2 seconds.\n \t\t %3 \n \t\t %4 \n" ).arg( QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString(),st.setNum(start.secsTo( QDateTime::currentDateTime() )),area,drawRays );
00198                 WriteMessage( logmessage );
00199                 *
00200                 */
00201                 QString logmessage = QString( "[%1]\t The script execution is successfully finished.\n" ).arg( QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString());
00202                 WriteMessage( logmessage );
00203         }
00204 
00205 }

00212 void ScriptEditorDialog::SetCurrentFile( QString fileName )
00213 {
00214         m_currentScritFileName = fileName;
00215 
00216         QString shownName = "Untitled";
00217         if ( !m_currentScritFileName.isEmpty() )
00218         {
00219                 shownName = QFileInfo( fileName ).fileName();
00220         }
00221 
00222         setWindowTitle( tr( "%1[*] - %2" ).arg( shownName ).arg( tr( "Tonatiuh" ) ) );
00223 
00224         QString time = QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString();
00225         QString logmessage = QString( "[%1]\t Current script file: '%2'").arg( QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString(), m_currentScritFileName  );
00226 
00227         WriteMessage( logmessage );
00228 }
00229 
00233 void ScriptEditorDialog::WriteMessage(  QString message )
00234 {
00235         logWidget->appendPlainText( message );
00236 }
